overview: In the midst of the confinement that the pandemic has brought us, those who live in family groups or in company, coexistence begins to be a time bomb where there is no space to take a breath and get rid of the pressures of life and relationships with others. The bathroom then becomes the only place where there is individual freedom to unburden oneself, to dream, to cry, to keep secrets and intimacies of the life one led in the times before confinement.
title: El baño
